name: Signon Screen
description: This screen is used for signing on to the system. It allows the user to enter a transaction name and provides options to proceed with the sign-on or exit the application.

fields.name: TRNNAME
fields.description: Field to input the transaction name for the sign-on process.
fields.validation: Must be a valid transaction name; no specific format constraints provided.

actions.name: Sign-on
actions.description: Proceeds with the sign-on process using the entered transaction name.
actions.outcome: The user is signed on to the system and navigated to the next screen or process.

actions.name: Exit
actions.description: Exits the sign-on screen and terminates the session.
actions.outcome: The user is returned to the previous screen or exits the application.

name: Main Menu
description: This screen serves as the main menu for the application, allowing users to navigate to different functionalities by entering a transaction name.

fields.name: TRNNAME
fields.description: Field to input the transaction name for navigation.
fields.validation: Must be a valid transaction name; maximum length of 4 characters.

actions.name: Enter transaction name
actions.description: Allows the user to navigate to a specific transaction by entering its name in the TRNNAME field.
actions.outcome: The application processes the input and navigates to the corresponding transaction screen.

name: Admin Menu Screen
description: This screen serves as the main administrative menu for the application, allowing users to enter transaction names and select options for further actions.

fields.name: Tran
fields.description: Label indicating the transaction name field.

fields.name: TRNNAME
fields.description: Field for entering the transaction name.
fields.validation: Must be a valid transaction name.

fields.name: OPTN012
fields.description: Field for displaying or entering additional options.

fields.name: OPTION
fields.description: Field for entering a numeric option to select an action.
fields.validation: Must be a numeric value, right-justified, and zero-padded.

fields.name: ERRMSG
fields.description: Field for displaying error messages.

actions.name: Enter option in OPTION field
actions.description: Allows the user to input a numeric option to proceed with a specific action.
actions.outcome: The selected option is processed, and the corresponding action is executed.

name: Account View
description: This screen is used to display and input account-related information, including account number, status, and opening date. It allows users to view and update specific account details.

fields.name: ACCTSID
fields.description: Account Number field for entering the account identifier.

fields.name: ACSTTUS
fields.description: Active Status field for selecting whether the account is active (Y/N).

fields.name: ADTOPEN
fields.description: Opened Date field for displaying the account's opening date.

actions.name: Enter account number
actions.description: Allows the user to input the account number into the ACCTSID field.
actions.outcome: The account number is captured for further processing.

actions.name: Select active status
actions.description: Allows the user to select whether the account is active (Y/N) in the ACSTTUS field.
actions.outcome: The active status is recorded for the account.

actions.name: View opened date
actions.description: Displays the account's opening date in the ADTOPEN field.
actions.outcome: The user can view the account's opening date.

name: Account Update Screen
description: This screen is used to update account details, including account number, active status, and opening date. It provides fields for data entry and options for processing or exiting the screen.

fields.name: ACCTSID
fields.description: Account Number
fields.validation: Must be 11 characters long and filled

fields.name: ACSTTUS
fields.description: Active Status (Y/N)
fields.validation: Must be a single character (Y or N)

fields.name: OPNYEAR
fields.description: Opening Year

fields.name: OPNMON
fields.description: Opening Month

fields.name: ERRMSG
fields.description: Error Message Display
fields.validation: Displays error messages if any issues occur

actions.name: ENTER=Process
actions.description: Processes the entered data and updates the account details
actions.outcome: Validates and saves the data; displays success or error messages

actions.name: F3=Exit
actions.description: Exits the screen without saving changes
actions.outcome: Returns to the previous screen or menu

actions.name: F5=Save
actions.description: Saves the entered data
actions.outcome: Saves the data and remains on the screen

actions.name: F12=Cancel
actions.description: Cancels the current operation and discards changes
actions.outcome: Clears the entered data and resets the screen

name: Card Listing Screen
description: This screen is used to display a list of credit cards and allows the user to input a transaction name for filtering or other purposes.

fields.name: TRNNAME
fields.description: Field to input the transaction name for filtering or identifying specific operations.
fields.validation: Must be a string with a maximum length of 4 characters.

actions.name: Input Transaction Name
actions.description: Allows the user to input a transaction name to filter or identify specific operations.
actions.outcome: The entered transaction name is used for further processing or filtering.

name: Credit Card Detail Screen
description: This screen is designed to capture and display details related to a credit card, including its activation status and expiry date. It allows users to input and view relevant information for managing credit card details.

fields.name: CRDSTCD
fields.description: Indicates whether the card is active (Y/N).
fields.validation: Must be a single character: 'Y' for Yes or 'N' for No.

fields.name: EXPMON
fields.description: The expiry month of the credit card.
fields.validation: Must be a two-digit number between 01 and 12.

fields.name: EXPYEAR
fields.description: The expiry year of the credit card.
fields.validation: Must be a four-digit number representing the year.

actions.name: Input Data
actions.description: Allows the user to input data into the fields for card activation status and expiry date.
actions.outcome: The entered data is captured and stored for further processing.

name: Update Credit Card Details
description: This screen is used to update credit card details, including account number, card number, and name on the card. It provides a user interface for entering and validating these details.

fields.name: Account Number
fields.description: The account number associated with the credit card.
fields.validation: Must be 11 characters long and numeric.

fields.name: Card Number
fields.description: The credit card number to be updated.
fields.validation: Must be 16 characters long and numeric.

fields.name: Name on Card
fields.description: The name printed on the credit card.

actions.name: Enter Account Number
actions.description: Allows the user to input the account number.
actions.outcome: The account number is captured for further processing.

actions.name: Enter Card Number
actions.description: Allows the user to input the credit card number.
actions.outcome: The card number is captured for further processing.

actions.name: Enter Name on Card
actions.description: Allows the user to input the name on the credit card.
actions.outcome: The name on the card is captured for further processing.

name: Transaction List
description: This screen displays a list of transactions and allows the user to view details, navigate through the list, and handle errors. It is designed for managing and reviewing transaction data.

fields.name: SEL0001
fields.description: Selection field for choosing a transaction from the list.
fields.validation: Must be a single character input.

fields.name: TRNID01
fields.description: Transaction ID field for displaying the unique identifier of a transaction.

fields.name: TDATE01
fields.description: Transaction date field for displaying the date of the transaction.
fields.validation: Must be a valid date format.

fields.name: TDESC01
fields.description: Transaction description field for displaying details about the transaction.

fields.name: TAMT001
fields.description: Transaction amount field for displaying the monetary value of the transaction.
fields.validation: Must be a valid numeric value.

fields.name: ERRMSG
fields.description: Error message field for displaying validation or system errors.

actions.name: Type 'S' to View Transaction Details
actions.description: Allows the user to view detailed information about a selected transaction.
actions.outcome: Displays the details of the selected transaction.

actions.name: Press ENTER to Continue
actions.description: Proceeds to the next step or screen in the workflow.
actions.outcome: Advances to the next screen or process.

actions.name: Press F3 to Go Back
actions.description: Navigates back to the previous screen.
actions.outcome: Returns to the previous screen.

actions.name: Press F7 to Move Backward
actions.description: Scrolls backward through the transaction list.
actions.outcome: Displays the previous set of transactions in the list.

actions.name: Press F8 to Move Forward
actions.description: Scrolls forward through the transaction list.
actions.outcome: Displays the next set of transactions in the list.

name: Transaction View
description: This screen is used to input and display transaction details, including the transaction name, date, program name, and titles. It serves as a user interface for managing and viewing transaction-related information.

fields.name: TRNNAME
fields.description: Field for entering the transaction name.

fields.name: TITLE01
fields.description: Display field for the first title.

fields.name: CURDATE
fields.description: Field for displaying the current date.

fields.name: PGMNAME
fields.description: Field for displaying the program name.

fields.name: TITLE02
fields.description: Display field for the second title.

name: Transaction Add Screen
description: This screen is used for adding a new transaction. It allows the user to input an account number and submit the transaction for processing.

fields.name: ACTIDIN
fields.description: Field to input the account number for the transaction.
fields.validation: Must be a valid account number format.

fields.name: CURTIME
fields.description: Displays the current time in the format 'hh:mm:ss'.

fields.name: TITLE02
fields.description: Displays the title or header for the screen.

actions.name: Add Transaction
actions.description: Submits the entered account number and processes the transaction.
actions.outcome: The transaction is added to the system and the user is notified of the result.

name: Report Confirmation Screen
description: This screen is used to confirm the submission of a report for printing. It allows the user to provide confirmation and displays error messages if necessary.

fields.name: CONFIRM
fields.description: Field for user to confirm the action by entering 'Y' for Yes or 'N' for No.

fields.name: ERRMSG
fields.description: Field to display error messages if the user input is invalid or if there is an issue with the submission.

actions.name: ENTER
actions.description: Submits the confirmation input provided by the user.
actions.outcome: Proceeds with the report submission if the input is valid.

actions.name: F3
actions.description: Navigates back to the previous screen.
actions.outcome: Returns the user to the previous screen without submitting the report.

name: Bill Payment Screen
description: This screen is used for processing bill payments, allowing users to input payment details and confirm transactions.

fields.name: Account Number
fields.description: The account number to which the bill payment is being made.
fields.validation: Must be a valid account number format.

fields.name: Payment Amount
fields.description: The amount to be paid for the bill.
fields.validation: Must be a positive number with up to two decimal places.

fields.name: Payment Date
fields.description: The date on which the payment is to be processed.
fields.validation: Must be a valid date in the format MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.name: Payment Method
fields.description: The method of payment (e.g., credit card, bank transfer).
fields.validation: Must be one of the predefined payment methods.

fields.name: Confirmation Message
fields.description: A message displayed to confirm the payment details before submission.

actions.name: Submit Payment
actions.description: Submits the payment details for processing.
actions.outcome: The payment is processed, and a confirmation message is displayed.

actions.name: Cancel
actions.description: Cancels the payment process and returns to the previous screen.
actions.outcome: The user is returned to the previous screen without saving any changes.

actions.name: Clear Fields
actions.description: Clears all input fields on the screen.
actions.outcome: All input fields are reset to their default state.

name: Users List Screen
description: This screen is used to display a list of users and allows the user to perform actions such as updating or deleting a user, navigating through the list, and continuing to the next step.

fields.name: PAGENUM
fields.description: Displays the current page number of the user list.

fields.name: USRIDIN
fields.description: Field for entering the User ID to search for a specific user.

fields.name: SEL
fields.description: Selection field for choosing a user from the list.

fields.name: ERRMSG
fields.description: Displays error messages or instructions for the user.

actions.name: ENTER
actions.description: Confirms the current action or selection.
actions.outcome: Proceeds to the next step or performs the selected action.

actions.name: F3
actions.description: Navigates back to the previous screen.
actions.outcome: Returns to the previous screen without saving changes.

actions.name: F7
actions.description: Scrolls backward through the user list.
actions.outcome: Displays the previous set of users in the list.

actions.name: F8
actions.description: Scrolls forward through the user list.
actions.outcome: Displays the next set of users in the list.

actions.name: Update User
actions.description: Updates the details of a selected user.
actions.type: Action triggered by typing 'U' in the SEL field.
actions.outcome: Opens a form to update the selected user's details.

actions.name: Delete User
actions.description: Deletes a selected user from the list.
actions.type: Action triggered by typing 'D' in the SEL field.
actions.outcome: Removes the selected user from the list after confirmation.

name: Add User Screen
description: This screen allows the user to add a new user by entering the required details such as First Name and performing the Add User action.

fields.name: First Name
fields.description: Field to input the first name of the user being added.

actions.name: Add User
actions.description: Submits the entered First Name to add a new user.
actions.outcome: The system processes the input and adds the user if the input is valid.

name: Update User Screen
description: This screen is used to update user information in the system. It allows the user to input and modify details such as User ID and First Name, and provides feedback on the success or failure of the operation.

fields.name: USRIDIN
fields.description: Field for entering the User ID to be updated.
fields.validation: Must not be empty. Length: 8 characters.

fields.name: FNAME
fields.description: Field for entering the First Name of the user.
fields.validation: Must not be empty. Length: 20 characters.

actions.name: Enter User ID
actions.description: Allows the user to input the User ID for the update operation.
actions.outcome: The User ID is captured for processing.

actions.name: Enter First Name
actions.description: Allows the user to input the First Name for the update operation.
actions.outcome: The First Name is captured for processing.

actions.name: SEND-USRUPD-SCREEN
actions.description: Submits the updated user information for processing.
actions.outcome: The system processes the update and displays a success or error message.

name: Delete User Screen
description: This screen is used to delete a user by capturing user details such as User ID, First Name, Last Name, and User Type. It also displays relevant prompts, messages, and allows navigation and actions related to user deletion.

fields.name: TRNNAME
fields.description: Transaction name displayed on the screen

fields.name: CURDATE
fields.description: Current date displayed in mm/dd/yy format

fields.name: PGMNAME
fields.description: Program name displayed on the screen

fields.name: CURTIME
fields.description: Current time displayed in hh:mm:ss format

fields.name: USRIDIN
fields.description: User ID input field for identifying the user to be deleted
fields.validation: Must not be empty; maximum length of 8 characters

fields.name: FNAME
fields.description: First Name of the user to be deleted

fields.name: LNAME
fields.description: Last Name of the user to be deleted

fields.name: USRTYPE
fields.description: User Type of the user to be deleted (e.g., Admin or User)
fields.validation: Must be one of the predefined values (A=Admin, U=User)

fields.name: ERRMSG
fields.description: Error message displayed in case of validation or operation failure

actions.name: ENTER=Fetch
actions.description: Fetches the details of the user based on the entered User ID
actions.outcome: Displays the user details if the User ID is valid; otherwise, shows an error message

actions.name: F3=Back
actions.description: Navigates back to the previous screen
actions.outcome: Returns to the previous screen without making any changes

actions.name: F4=Clear
actions.description: Clears all input fields on the screen
actions.outcome: Resets all fields to their initial state

actions.name: F5=Delete
actions.description: Deletes the user based on the entered details
actions.outcome: Deletes the user if the details are valid; otherwise, displays an error message
